p: HEK293 cells and MRC5 cells were obtained from ATCC. HFFs were provided by Dr. Min-Hua Luo (Wuhan Institute of Virology, CAS). MITA -/- MLF-MITA-Flag cells were previously described [ 13, 52]. These cells were cultured in DMEM (Hyclone) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco) and 1% penicillin–streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific) at 37°C with 5% CO2. All cells were negative for mycoplasma.
